snippet: Some supporters of the ruling protecting churches from some employment discrimination suits said religious organizations were still obligated to treat employees fairly.
lead_paragraph: Some supporters of the ruling protecting churches from some employment discrimination suits said religious organizations were still obligated to treat employees fairly.

headline.seo: Hosanna-Tabor Ruling Welcomed by Religious Groups
headline.main: Religious Groups Greet Ruling With Satisfaction
headline.print_headline: Religious Groups Greet Ruling With Satisfaction
